lustre/tests/multifstat.c

00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <sys/types.h>
00037 #include <sys/stat.h>
00038 #include <unistd.h>
00039 #include <fcntl.h>
00040 #include <errno.h>
00041 #include <string.h>
00042 
00043 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00044 {
00045         int fd1, fd2;
00046         struct stat st1, st2;
00047 
00048         if (argc != 3) {
00049                 printf("Usage %s file1 file2\n", argv[0]);
00050                 return 1;
00051         }
00052 
00053 
00054         fd1 = open(argv[1], O_CREAT| O_RDWR, 0666);
00055         if (fd1 == -1) {
00056                 printf("Error opening %s: %s\n", argv[1], strerror(errno));
00057                 return errno;
00058         }
00059 
00060         fd2 = open(argv[2], O_RDONLY);
00061         if (fd2 == -1) {
00062                 printf("Error opening %s: %s\n", argv[2], strerror(errno));
00063                 return errno;
00064         }
00065 
00066         sleep(1);
00067 
00068         if ( write(fd1, "hello", strlen("hello")) != strlen("hello")) {
00069                 printf("Error writing: %s\n", strerror(errno));
00070                 return errno;
00071         }
00072 
00073         if ( fstat(fd1, &st1) ) {
00074                 printf("Error statting %s: %s\n", argv[1], strerror(errno));
00075                 return errno;
00076         }
00077 
00078         if ( fstat(fd2, &st2) ) {
00079                 printf("Error statting %s: %s\n", argv[2], strerror(errno));
00080                 return errno;
00081         }
00082 
00083         if ( st1.st_size != st2.st_size ) {
00084                 printf("Sizes don't match %lu, %lu\n",
00085                        (unsigned long)st1.st_size,
00086                        (unsigned long)st2.st_size);
00087                 return 1;
00088         }
00089 
00090         if ( st1.st_mtime != st2.st_mtime ) {
00091                 printf("Mtimes don't match %ld, %ld\n",
00092                        st1.st_mtime, st2.st_mtime);
00093                 return 1;
00094         }
00095 
00096         if ( st1.st_blocks != st2.st_blocks ) {
00097                 printf("Blocks don't match %ld, %ld\n",
00098                        (long)st1.st_blocks, (long)st2.st_blocks);
00099                 return 1;
00100         }
00101 
00102         return 0;
00103 }
